name: I Can't Get No Satisfaction (Train Jam 2016)
name_original: I Can't Get No Satisfaction (Train Jam 2016)
description:
I Can't Get No Satisfaction was made as part of the three day game jam on the California Zephyr Amtrak Train across the US from Chicago to San Francisco.

The theme of the Jam was to make a game about "Maximum Capacity"

We created a runner/sim style game about getting your train to the end of the line in the time limit while trying to keep you passengers satisfied. This is achieved by making sure you drop them off at stations and avoid any obstacles.

You also gain a bonus for reaching the end with the maximum capacity in your train.

Enjoy!
